TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ConfigurationSet extends System.Object

Docs.summary: The ConfigurationSet class represents a configuration set for one or more AD LDS instances.
Gets a read-only collection of AD LDS instances that are in the configuration set.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstanceCollection"> object that contains the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance> objects that are in the configuration set.

Docs.summary: Gets a read-only collection of application partitions that are in the configuration set.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartitionCollection"> object that contains the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ApplicationPartition> objects that are in the configuration set.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases all managed and unmanaged resources that are used by the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.Boolean"> value that determines if the managed resources should be released. `true` if the managed resources should be released; `false` if only the unmanaged resources should be released.
Docs.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object and optionally releases managed resources.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance FindAdamInstance() cil managed

Docs.summary: Finds an AD LDS instance in this configuration set.
Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance"> object that represents an AD LDS instance that was found.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance FindAdamInstance(string partitionName) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that specifies a partition in which to search.
Docs.summary: Finds an AD LDS instance in this configuration set for a given partition name.
Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance"> object that represents an AD LDS instance that was found.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance FindAdamInstance(string partitionName, string siteName) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that specifies a partition in which to search.
A <see cref="T:System.String"> that specifies a site in which to search.
Docs.summary: Finds an AD LDS instance in this configuration set for a given partition name and site name.
Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance"> object that represents an AD LDS instance that was found.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstanceCollection FindAllAdamInstances() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns all AD LDS instances in this configuration set.
Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstanceCollection"> object that contains the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance> objects that were found.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstanceCollection FindAllAdamInstances(string partitionName) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that specifies a partition in which to search.
Docs.summary: Returns all AD LDS instances in this configuration set for a given partition name.
Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstanceCollection"> object that contains the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance> objects that were found.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstanceCollection FindAllAdamInstances(string partitionName, string siteName) cil managed

Docs.param: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that specifies a partition in which to search.
A <see cref="T:System.String"> that specifies a partition in which to search.
Docs.summary: Returns all AD LDS instances in this configuration set for a given partition name and site name.
Docs.returns: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstanceCollection"> object that contains the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance> objects that are found.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet GetConfigurationSet(class System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryContext"> object that contains the target and credentials to use to retrieve the object. The target of the context can be an AD LDS instance or keywords that are specified in the serviceConnectionPoint object in the current forest that can identify the configuration set.
Docs.summary: Returns an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet"> object for the specified directory context.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet"> object that represents the configuration set for the specified context.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry GetDirectoryEntry() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> object for the configuration partition.
Docs.returns: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.DirectoryEntry"> object for the configuration partition.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationSecurityLevel GetSecurityLevel() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the AD LDS replication security level.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationSecurityLevel"> value that indicates the current AD LDS replication authentication mode.

Docs.summary: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet"> object.
Docs.value: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that contains the name of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet> object.

Docs.summary: Gets the AD LDS instance that is the current owner of the domain naming master role.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance"> object that represents the AD LDS instance that currently holds the domain naming master role.

Docs.summary: Gets the schema object for the configuration set.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySchema"> object that represents the schema for this configuration set.

Docs.summary: Gets the AD LDS instance that is the current owner of the schema operations master role.
Docs.value:
An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.AdamInstance"> object that represents the AD LDS+
instance that currently holds the schema operations master role.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetSecurityLevel(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationSecurityLevel securityLevel) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReplicationSecurityLevel"> value to which to set the AD LDS replication authentication mode.
Docs.summary: Sets the AD LDS replication security level.
Gets a read-only collection of sites that are in the configuration set.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ReadOnlySiteCollection"> object that contains <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySite> objects that are in the configuration set.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the name of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet"> object.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.String"> that contains the name of the current <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ConfigurationSet> object.
